name: B737 Checklist
description:
The B737 Checklist app brings paperless checklists straight to your palm. Checklists are complete for generic standard operations of an B737 series aircraft. This app is ideally suited for pilots flying on Flight Simulators at home, especially for Flight Simulator add-ons such as PMDG B737.

Features:

- B737 standard operating checklists
- Very easy and intuitive user interface
- Simple checkmarking system to mark completed items
- Use in any orientation, our checklists adapt to your needs
- iPad Compatible
- Fly at night with Dark mode
- Now also on your Mac

*** This app is for entertainment purposes only! We are not affiliated with Boeing or any airline ***
